name: V_SMRTDTA_ELEM_VAL_ALL_EXT
description:
This view combines historical and current values for SmartData elements and includes an external formatted value column, and an Electronic Health Information column descriptor column for values that reference records which can be used to join to tables with data related to that record.





Because this view references tables that can get very large, it is highly recommended that any query built off of this view includes a filter on at least one indexed column. The indexed columns are: HLV_ID, CONTEXT_NAME, RECORD_ID_VARCHAR, RECORD_ID_NUMERIC.

columns.name: HLV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the SmartData element value.

columns.name: UPDATE_NUM
columns.description: This column groups together rows of data that were stored together. A higher UPDATE_NUM means a more recent update.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this update. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ELEMENT_ID
columns.description: The SmartData identifier (SDI) for this row.  This column is indexed, so including a filter on this column will be beneficial for performance.

columns.name: SMRTDTA_ELEM_VALUE
columns.description: The SmartData element value entered by a user through a SmartForm, SmartTool or other documentation tool that files discrete data to SmartData elements.

columns.name: LATEST_VALUE_YN
columns.description: This column returns 'Y' if this line is a current value (i.e, if the data is coming from SMRTDTA_ELEM_VALUE) and 'N' if it's a historical value (i.e, if the data is coming from ELEM_VAL_PREV_VAL.)

columns.name: VALUE_UPDATE_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the SmartData element value was entered by a user through a SmartForm, SmartTool or other documentation tool that files discrete data to SmartData elements.

columns.name: CONTEXT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the context associated with this row. Contexts organize SmartData element data into different categories and determine under what circumstances data is stored. Examples of contexts include "Patient" and "Episode".  This column is indexed, so including a filter on this column will be beneficial for performance.

columns.name: CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for a contact this record is linked to. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: RECORD_ID_VARCHAR
columns.description: The unique ID of the linked record that is associated with the SmartData element value of the current row. The type of linked record (patient, order, note, etc.) is determined by the context specified in the CONTEXT_NAME column of the current row. This column will be populated with a varchar version of the numeric ID if the type is numeric.  This column is indexed, so including a filter on this column will be beneficial for performance.

columns.name: RECORD_ID_NUMERIC
columns.description: The unique ID of the linked record that is associated with the SmartData element value of the current row. The type of linked record (patient, order, note, etc.) is determined by the context specified in the CONTEXT_NAME column of the current row. This column is only populated if the linked record ID is in numeric format.  This column is indexed, so including a filter on this column will be beneficial for performance.

columns.name: PAT_LINK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record linked to the SmartData element. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: VALUE_UPDATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the SmartData element value was entered by a user through a SmartForm, SmartTool or other documentation tool that files discrete data to SmartData elements in the UTC timezone.

columns.name: VALUE_UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who entered the SmartData element value for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: VALUE_UPDATE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: SRC_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Links to the note that created the current value.

columns.name: SRC_NOTE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The status of the source note.

columns.name: PREV_VALUE_INVLD_YN
columns.description: Indicate a previous value to be invalid.

columns.name: SMRTDTA_ELEM_VALUE_EXTERNAL
columns.description: The SmartData element value entered by a user through a SmartForm, SmartTool or other documentation tool that files discrete data to SmartData elements. This value is converted to an external format, depending on the value type. For database element category values, this column will contain the category title. For database element static record values, this will contain the record name as of value filing or initially being extracted. For date values, this column will contain a date string in YYYY-MM-DD format. For time values, this column will contain a timestamp string in HH24:MM:SS format. For instant values this column will contain a string that uses both the aforementioned date and time formats. For all other value types this column will be NULL.

columns.name: COLUMN_DESCRIPTOR
columns.description: The name of a column that can be used to join from a raw database type networked record ID in the SMRTDTA_ELEM_VALUE column to the corresponding data table for that record type, specifically for use in the Electronic Health Information export process.
